<dt class="note">[[User:Demellion|Demellion]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
'''NOTE''': When [[remoteExec]]/[[remoteExecCall]] is called from a headless client to client, this will always return as false.<br> 
This effect also occurs with [[remoteExecutedOwner]] - it will return always return 0 from a headless client..<br> 
</dd>
